channel.title: A few things i would like to see in BMS
channel.description:
1.i would like to see more scientist models and more character designs to make the environment feel more realistic. 2.some crowbar texture changing things. ex:when you hit an alien with it green blood is on it when you hit a human red blood (a little darker than the crowbars default color) on it and for the blood to casually wash off while in water. 3.for sounds such as foot steps to be an option to turn off.This one doesn't bother me but a few of my friends complained about it. 4.some hidden weapons/rooms that don't require cheats and a reference to chumtoad.
I hope you took some of my suggestion's into mind and thank you for reading.

item.title: A few things i would like to see in BMS
item.dc:creator: Brockley
item.description:
Yeah, and Iyiyiy, I don’t think you are aware that it is only Black Mesa now as opposed to Black Mesa: Source. You can just call it BM instead of BMS.

Read full topic

item.title: A few things i would like to see in BMS
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
The scientist model/ blood on the weapons is already in. The footsteps can be turned off by replacing the footstep sounds with silent .wav files with the same names. Number 4 will probably don’t happen never.

item.title: A few things i would like to see in BMS
item.dc:creator: Iyiyiy9
item.description:
1.i would like to see more scientist models and more character designs to make the environment feel more realistic.
2.some crowbar texture changing things. ex:when you hit an alien with it green blood is on it when you hit a human red blood (a little darker than the crowbars default color) on it and for the blood to casually wash off while in water.
3.for sounds such as foot steps to be an option to turn off.This one doesn’t bother me but a few of my friends complained about it.
4.some hidden weapons/rooms that don’t require cheats and a reference to chumtoad.

I hope you took some of my suggestion’s into mind and thank you for reading.
